resources.string: Host is unavailable. Try to test your network connection.
Login failed. Make sure you entered your username and password correctly.
The host does not respond for a long time. Try later.
Connection refused. The server may be temporarily unavailable.
Secure connection error. Check your network settings.
Data read/write error. Please try again.
Data format error. The server returned unexpected data.
An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
Write permission is required to save the file to the device
Without write permissions, the app will not be able to save the file to your device. Permissions can be enabled in the app settings
